a1: Each page is rendered as an image and compared pixel by pixel. The tool shows both versions side by side and calculates a difference percentage for each page.
q2: Can I compare PDFs with different page counts?
a2: Yes. If one PDF has more pages than the other, the extra pages are shown alongside empty placeholders and marked as 100% different.
a3: All processing happens in your browser. Your files never leave your device.
